articles.description: Nottingham Forest forward Taiwo Awoniyi is no longer in an induced coma after undergoing surgery to repair a serious abdominal injury.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: Taiwo Awoniyi out of induced coma after surgery

articles.description: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim says he has no intention of walking out on the Europa League finalists despite their domestic struggles.
articles.title: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim: 'I'm far from quitting'

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Madrid vs Mallorca in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Real Madrid vs Mallorca: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Ajax concede a 99th-minute equaliser to 10-man Groningen on the penultimate day of the season to lose top spot in the Eredivisie, and give PSV the edge in the title race.
articles.title: Groningen 2-2 Ajax: Late goal costs Ajax top spot and sends PSV top of Eredivisie

articles.description: Reddit founder Alexis Ohanian has bought a £20 million stake in Women's Super League champions Chelsea.
articles.title: Alexis Ohanian: Reddit founder and Serena Williams' husband buys stake in Chelsea Women

articles.description: Bologna edge out AC Milan to win the Coppa Italia, their first major trophy since 1974.
articles.title: AC Milan 0-1 Bologna: Bologna win Coppa Italia to end 51-year trophy drought

articles.description: Chelsea's Enzo Maresca is backed by the hierarchy at Stamford Bridge and is expected to stay in charge even if his team fail to reach the Champions League.
articles.title: Enzo Maresca: Chelsea to back coach even if team miss out on Champions League

articles.description: How does Liverpool target Jeremie Frimpong compare with outgoing Trent Alexander-Arnold? BBC Sport takes a look at the numbers.
articles.title: Jeremie Frimpong: How does Liverpool target compare with Trent Alexander-Arnold?

articles.description: The injury suffered by Nottingham Forest striker Taiwo Awoniyi has raised questions about the application of the offside law.
articles.title: Taiwo Awoniyi: Did 'late flag' offside law expose him to injury?

articles.description: British number one Jack Draper is knocked out of the Italian Open as Carlos Alcaraz shows his quality under pressure to reach the semi-finals.
articles.title: Italian Open 2025 results: Jack Draper loses to Carlos Alcaraz in Rome quarter-finals
